title: Biden's Democracy Summit Convenes as U.S. Hits a ‘Rough Patch’
content:
1. Biden's Democracy Summit Convenes as U.S. Hits a ‘Rough Patch’  The New York Times
  2. Live: Joe Biden hosts 'Summit for Democracy' with world leaders  The Independent
  3. 'Democracy doesn't happen by accident': Biden says at summit  Reuters
  4. Biden (and Putin)’s nostalgia for the Cold War  Al Jazeera English
  5. Biden needs to add development to his democracy summit's agenda | TheHill  The Hill
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 米国が「荒波」にもまれる中、バイデンの民主主義サミットが開催される
拜登民主峰会召开，美国遭遇 "坎坷"。
